HeroSection.title: Hi, I'm Szymon
HeroSection.subtitle: I'm a Front-End Developer
HeroSection.description: For the last 5 years, I've been building and scaling software for amazing companies. I also teach online painting classes (in case you have a blank canvas handy). Let's get in touch!
